nodes.text: Cosmo White is a Brighton-based British freelance artist specializing in comics, illustration and character design. He penciled the Star Wars Rebels short comics "Never Far Behind" and "A Trooper's Worth," as well as the Star Wars Resistance comics "Fuel for the Fire" and "The High Tower". Additionally, he did the colors on "The Recruit, Part 1" and "The Recruit, Part 2."
